name: Distributor Offline
description:
This game is a students project of MMI training of IUT Saint-Dié-des-Vosges based on France. We create this game with only 5 people during our last year of study.

Stéphane ANGENAULT - 3D modeler, animator and texture artist.

Alexane CLODOT - Communication, crowdfunding and scenario.

Marceau DIVOUX - 2D artist, Illustrator, graphic artist, concept artist.

Florian DURY - Unity Integrator and VFX artist (Visual Effects).

Adeline GIRARD - Communication, Soundtrack Artist and crowdfunding.

BUILD INFORMATION

The game is currently not finished, it's a pre-alpha (V 0.3.6.3).

The build work on windows 7/8/10. The Mac build is under construction. The version will be available soon !

MORE

We leave you available 4 wallpaper and the integral original OST (soundtrack) of Distributor Offline for FREE too.

We hope you enjoy !

SOCIAL NETWORK

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/DistributorOffline/

Twitter : https://twitter.com/DistributorOff

Cherry on the Game Team !
